      • customFactorExists

        @Matlab
boolean customFactorExists(java.lang.String factorName)
        Indicates whether or not the specified factor is available only as a custom factor.
        Parameters:
        factorName -
        Returns:
        True only for custom factors that do not have a corresponding FactorFunction of the same name

      • getMatlabSolveWrapper

        @Matlab
@Nullable
java.lang.String getMatlabSolveWrapper()
        Returns the name of a solver-specific MATLAB wrapper function that should be invoked from MATLAB to do the solve. The value or existence of the function is allowed to change depending on the parameters to the solver. The MATLAB function should take two positional arguments: the MATLAB FactorGraph object and the instance of this interface.
        Returns:
        name of MATLAB function used to do actual solve in MATLAB interface or null if there is none.
